name: Amazing Jam Hugo Mania
description:
Here comes the new Jam Hugo Mania match-3 game!
Make matches of 3 or more jam fruits in over 200 various levels, create fruity blast!
Join this fruit puzzle adventure, match, blast and collect scrumptiously juicy fruits.

How to Play
- Match 3 or more adjacent same jam fruits to make juicy blast
- 4 or more jam fruits' blasting triggers power-ups and combos
- Explosive power-ups skyrocket your fun
